segments.text: Yes , I want to book a room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . What kind of room do you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , could you let me see the room ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's fine . What beautiful scenery outside the window ! I think this one will do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am glad you like it .
segments.speaker: S1
